Package com.limelight.server

Class StreamTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.limelight.server.StreamTimer
  • public class StreamTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    Timer for the each livestream session.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StreamTimer()
      Constructor initializes new timer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addSecondsToLivestream​(long seconds)
      Increase the number of seconds the livestreamer is allowed to stream, unless cut off by the maximumLivestreamSeconds cap.
      void decreaseSecondsFromLivestream​(long seconds)
      Decrease the number of seconds the livestreamer is allowed to stream.
      boolean getHasTimeLeft()
      Returns true if the timer has time left to run or false if the timer has expired.
      long getSecondsLeftOfLivestream()
      How many more seconds the livestreamer can stream, unless cut off by the maximumLivestreamSeconds cap.
      long getSecondsPastDuringLivestream()
      How long the livestream has already been running
      void secondHasPassed()
      This function is called every second.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamTimer

        public StreamTimer()
        Constructor initializes new timer. secondHasPassed should be called every second

    • Method Detail

      • secondHasPassed

        public void secondHasPassed()
        This function is called every second. Simulates one second passing for a livestream.

      • getSecondsPastDuringLivestream

        public long getSecondsPastDuringLivestream()
        How long the livestream has already been running
        Returns:
        seconds

      • getSecondsLeftOfLivestream

        public long getSecondsLeftOfLivestream()
        How many more seconds the livestreamer can stream, unless cut off by the maximumLivestreamSeconds cap.
        Returns:
        seconds

      • addSecondsToLivestream

        public void addSecondsToLivestream​(long seconds)
        Increase the number of seconds the livestreamer is allowed to stream, unless cut off by the maximumLivestreamSeconds cap.
        Parameters:
        seconds - amount of seconds to increase secondsLeftOfLivestream.

      • decreaseSecondsFromLivestream

        public void decreaseSecondsFromLivestream​(long seconds)
        Decrease the number of seconds the livestreamer is allowed to stream.
        Parameters:
        seconds - amount of seconds to decrease secondsLeftOfLivestream.

      • getHasTimeLeft

        public boolean getHasTimeLeft()
        Returns true if the timer has time left to run or false if the timer has expired.
        Returns:
        hasTimeLeft
